name: Gimme 5
description:
Five amazing games, one amazingly low price

The Gimme Five bundle contains five of Curve Digital’s most loved and critically-acclaimed titles. With a wide range of genres, there’s something for everyone to enjoy. 

The Gimme Five bundle contains:
•         Human: Fall Flat
•         The Flame in the Flood 
•         Dear Esther 
•         Serial Cleaner
•         Manual Samuel
